DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no/unknown indicator to ask whether the patient is off of protocol treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a patient being off-treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Off-Treatment; the phase of a protocol during which a patient does not receive treatment.

Concepts.definition: When a patient is not receiving therapy they are considered off treatment.  In clinical trials, a dosing schedule may require a patient to stop medication for a period of time, then resume, such as 28 days on and 7 days off.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: justification for or explanation of the administration or cessation of therapy.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: -COMMENT
ReferenceDocuments.description: If yes, please complete Off Treatment Form

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are there circumstances that will not permit patient to complete therapy or adequate follow-up

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are there circumstances that will not permit completion of study therapy or the required follow-up

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are there any circumstances that will not permit the patient to complete the study or its required follow-up?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any psychological, familial, sociological, or geographical condition that my potentially hamper compliance with the study protocol and follow-up schedule?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient go off protocol treatment prior to going off-study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are there circumstances at the time of study entry that do not permit completion of the study or required follow-up?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have psychological ability and general health that permits completion of the study requirements and required follow up?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have any serious and/or unstable pre-existing medical disorder (aside from malignancy exception above), psychiatric disorder, or other conditions that could interfere with subject safety, obtaining informed consent or compliance to the study procedures?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has anything changed in the patient's medical history that requires them to come off study?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has anything changed in the patient's medical history that requires them to come off study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the reason for prematurely discontinuing the study impacted by COVID-19

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Treatment/Off-treatment Reason Ind-3 2018336v1.0 with VD ID#3506034 - Yes No Unknown Indicator  - dbw 03-24-2020 Fixed apostrophe in Ref Doc DW
